content:
The chunk contains essential imports from Panda3D's core library required to implement a 3D rope class using NURBS curves. The imported modules include configuration variables, node paths, curve evaluators, point definitions, and vertex data structures necessary for creating and manipulating rope geometry in a 3D environment.

from panda3d.core import (
    ConfigVariableBool,
    NodePath,
    NurbsCurveEvaluator,
    Point3,
    RopeNode,
    VBase3,
    VBase4,
)
